feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Going in to exult over a fallen enemy, and to praise a strong-minded sister for the banishment of an objectionable lover, it certainly was a shock to behold the aforesaid enemy serenely sitting on the sofa, with the strong-minded sister enthroned upon his knee, and wearing an expression of the most abject submission.

causedByEvent.name: Unexpected sight of Meg and Mr. Brooke together

feels.name: Jealousy
feels.quote: Poor Jo never got her laugh, for she was transfixed upon the threshold by a spectacle which held her there, staring with her mouth nearly as wide open as her eyes.

causedByEvent.name: Seeing Meg and Mr. Brooke together

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: Rushing upstairs, she startled the invalids by exclaiming tragically, as she burst into the room, 'Oh do somebody go down quick; John Brooke is acting dreadfully, and Meg likes it!'

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: Perfectly resigned to his discharge, he devoted himself to getting well, preparing for business, and earning a home for Meg.

feels.name: Happiness
feels.quote: The light of which touched their faces with a grace the little artist could not copy.

feels.name: Contentment
feels.quote: How much has happened since I said that! It seems a year ago.
